statements: SELECT * FROM floor_plans;
SELECT floor_id, building_id FROM floor_plans WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, layout_image FROM floor_plans ORDER BY building_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM floor_plans WHERE access_control_points IS NOT NULL;
SELECT floor_id, building_id, layout_image FROM floor_plans WHERE floor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM floor_plans WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT floor_id, building_id FROM floor_plans WHERE floor_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM floor_plans ORDER BY building_id DESC, floor_id ASC;
SELECT floor_id, COUNT(*) AS floor_count FROM floor_plans GROUP BY floor_id;
SELECT * FROM floor_plans WHERE access_control_points->'main_entrance' = 'authorized';
SELECT * FROM FloorPlans;
SELECT floor_name, floor_id FROM FloorPlans ORDER BY floor_id DESC;
SELECT access_point_id, location_id, access_level FROM AccessControlPoints WHERE access_level = 'Restricted';
SELECT * FROM AccessControlPoints WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT floor_name FROM FloorPlans WHERE floor_id = 3;
SELECT floor_id, floor_name, layout FROM FloorPlans WHERE floor_id = 1;
SELECT floor_name, layout, floor_id FROM FloorPlans WHERE floor_id > 3 ORDER BY floor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FloorPlans INNER JOIN AccessControlPoints ON FloorPlans.floor_id = AccessControlPoints.location_id;
SELECT floor_name FROM FloorPlans WHERE floor_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM AccessControlPoints ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM FloorPlans;
SELECT floor_id, floor_plan_image FROM FloorPlans;
SELECT building_name, floors FROM BuildingLayouts ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM BuildingLayouts WHERE floors > 5;
SELECT point_name, location FROM AccessControlPoints WHERE accessibility = true;
SELECT * FROM FloorPlans WHERE floor_id = 1;
SELECT floor_plan_image, access_control_points FROM FloorPlans WHERE floor_id = 2;
SELECT building_name, floors FROM BuildingLayouts WHERE layout_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM AccessControlPoints WHERE location LIKE '%lobby%';
SELECT point_id, point_name FROM AccessControlPoints WHERE accessibility = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM FloorPlans;
SELECT floor_name, building_name FROM FloorPlans;
SELECT image_url, floor_name FROM FloorPlans ORDER BY floor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM AccessControlPoints WHERE location='Main Entrance';
SELECT e_id, description, date_time FROM Emergencies ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM FloorPlans WHERE building_name = 'Main Building';
SELECT floor_name, building_name FROM FloorPlans WHERE p_id = 2 ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT acp.location, fp.floor_name FROM AccessControlPoints acp JOIN FloorPlans fp ON acp.floor_id = fp.p_id WHERE fp.building_name = 'Admin Building';
SELECT e.description, el.log_description FROM Emergencies e JOIN EmergencyLog el ON e.e_id = el.e_id ORDER BY e.date_time DESC;

SELECT fp.floor_name, acp.location, el.log_description FROM FloorPlans fp JOIN AccessControlPoints acp ON fp.p_id = acp.floor_id JOIN EmergencyLog el ON acp.acp_id = el.acp_id WHERE fp.floor_name = 'Ground Floor';
SELECT * FROM FloorPlans WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT floor_name, floor_layout FROM FloorPlans WHERE floor_id = 3;
SELECT building_name, total_floors, construction_date FROM BuildingLayouts WHERE building_id = 2;
SELECT access_point_name, access_type FROM AccessControlPoints WHERE building_id = 1 AND floor_id = 4;
SELECT employee_name, department, access_level FROM BuildingEmployees WHERE building_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM FloorPlans WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, total_floors FROM BuildingLayouts WHERE construction_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT access_point_name, access_type FROM AccessControlPoints WHERE building_id = 2 AND floor_id = 3;
SELECT emergency_type, emergency_contact FROM Emergencies WHERE building_id = 3 AND floor_id = 2 ORDER BY emergency_type;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM BuildingEmployees WHERE building_id = 1 AND access_level = 'Admin';
